thread.title: MALOU HAFNER
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da MALOU HAFNER

author: MALOU HAFNER
title: MALOU HAFNER
text: This is my second time buying from Otticanet. I have not had to return anything so I cannot speak to customer service in that regard. BUT I have loved the PRADA frames that I have purchased. There is an added step of processing some documents to take care of "free shipping" but other than that, the experience is pretty smooth.
